ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Organised Skill Development Programmes on Jute diversified products and Bamboo based handloom and handicraft Products, Tailoring for unemployed poor women artisan under SC ST OBC Minorities . Bank linkages women JLGs and SHGs through Micro finance. Micro Enterprise Development Programmes on Tailoring ( mosquito-net making and ladies dress making ) for women SHG, JLG members in rural and urban areas.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Micro Enterprise Development Programme on Mosquito-net making and Bamboo handicrafts for women SHG members so that they could earn their livelihood.

3-months Skill Development Programme on cane and bamboo handicrafts training held from 27th may, 2016 to 29th August, 2016 for poor unemployed women under Ballabhpur G.P. area. Altogether 25 women candidates have successfully completed the programme.

Entrepreneurship Awareness Programmes on income generation activities, formation of SHGs and JLGs for poor unemployed women in West Tripura district were conducted by TWWS with its own fund during the financial year 2016-17. Also took part in SARAS Fair during the year held in Hapania , West Tripura district.
TWWS has organised 13-Days MEDP on Jute based Handicraft Products held at Aralia, Agartala, Tripura (West) for 30 women SHG members under the sponsorship of NABARD, Tripura Regional Office.
